We use to buy them from our vet until they didn't have the large size one month and I check Amazon and I've been ordering them from Amazon ever since (cheaper too).  The vet had been after me to have the dogs teeth cleaned but now marvels at how clean my 10 year old Fox Terrier's teeth have become... and our two year old golden retriever's are the same.  Give them one a day (the large size cut in half) in the morning after they eat.

My Great Dane, Daisy, absolutely loves these chews. When she hears the bag opening, she knows her treat is waiting for her. She just grabs it out of my hand and runs off. I like that it helps to clean her teeth since she's prone to tartar buildup. Believe me, I'd love to brush them, but she won't let me anywhere near her mouth (might have something to do with her being a rescue). At any rate, I would recommend this product to anyone who wants their dog to have nice, clean teeth and fresh breath.

Extra large totally inconsistent. Worst shipment of these chews. I have 4 dogs two large two small one large dog can't have these chews anymore because of choking on thin pieces. Other dog ok but they are thin small and not worth the money. After this bag I won't order these again for big dogs.

I have been buying these for my dog for a few years. She has had excellent dental
checkups and no gum disease. I highly recommend this product. It is rather pricey but it still beats getting a dental cleaning from the vet. The only issue I have with them is that the size of the chews are not uniform -- most are of the expected size but some are not really extra large.
I've been ordering this product for over a year now and it's kept my dog out of the dentist "chair".

I have three fairly big dogs -- 50 to 65 pounds -- who all love to chew. They love these chips and they last long enough to give them a good chew. They have a little bit of an odor, but it's not unpleasant and it doesn't linger. They also don't leave stains on the carpet. The price is great compared to similar chips for retail outlets. I marked them down one star because you do get a few in every bag that are not as hefty as the rest.
My dog loves these chews.  She is 8 years old and her teeth are perfect!  Never has bad breath.  This is a high quality product that I will continue to order.

column9: good job at cleaning their teeth
column10: These chews appear to be a great dental solution for my dogs. There is a bit of inconsistency with the size of the strips and be careful as to where your dog works on them as they will stain carpets. Overall the chews seem to do a good job at cleaning their teeth and breathe.

column9: one every night as a treat
column10: I try to give him one every night as a treat. Although my puppy is only 4 mos and only 22 lbs, he is quite the rough chewer so the Medium size is just fine for him. We may need to step up to the large size as he gets older and larger in size.
I can't find this size locally for my huge dog. He never gets tired of this treat and at almost 6 years of age the vet doesn't see a need for teeth cleaning.

Our wheaten terrier and pointer love these!  They weigh 30 and 50 pounds, but we still order the extra-large size. We used to buy these from our vet, but these larger quantity bags are a better price. They help with teeth and gum health.

Have used these for years, first time I've had a batch this tough; first time ordered from Amazon.  Had to cut in half on a band saw so my 120 lb G. Shepard could chew. Will order from pet supply in future.

If your dog chews these up into tiny pieces, they're probably good treats for him/her. Our Golden Retriever chews them down to two inch or larger pieces that she tries to swallow. They get caught in her throat choking her and we have to get our fingers down her throat past the piece to pull it out, very abusive for the dog. If we don't catch the problem when she first starts to choke, it could be fatal.

We've stopped giving her these treats.

My vet sells these for way more than they are listed on here. I have four dogs, and only one wont chew them. Also, like most rawhides, don't leave your dogs unsupervised with this item. One of my dogs keeps hacking for a second after he's finished and that makes me nervous.

We've ordered these before and had no problem. This time however, with the second treat, my boxer mix almost choked to death. I pulled the small chunk out of his mouth. Later on at night, he hacked up and vomited another small piece along with his two earlier meals of the day. The piece was still super hard. It seems that they fragment easier than before after a bit of chewing. Will not be ordering again and will be returning my bag as the choking risk is not worth it. There are other and better chews out there. For those of you that feed this to your dogs, please watch carefully as they might try to eat the small fragmented pieces!

column9: Cet hextra premium oral hygiene chews
column10: Great price and Quick delivery.  However, the package was  poorly packed.  The box was crushed and the package was split open, therefore compromising the freshness of the product.

column9: 11 year old Black Lab loves them
column10: I have tried several other brands of dental chews for my 11 year old black lab, Bonnie.  She "inhales" most other dental chews thus defeating their purpose.  I bought the extra lg C.E.T. Hextra and she loves them!  I cut them in half so I get 2 months from the 30 count package.  It takes her about 10 minutes of chewing before finally devouring  and after 2 weeks, there is a noticeable improvement in her teeth and gums.  I do watch her to assure she doesn't try to swallow whole pieces but, so far, it hasn't been a problem.  I will be ordering more from Amazon as this packages dwindles.  I have recommended this product to friends who have old and young large dogs and have received postive feedback from all. Now if I could find something similar for this old human's use.

C.E.T. HEXtra Premium Oral Hygiene Chews with Chlorhexidine, Extra-Large Dogs, 30 Chews

This product was introduced to me from my dogs Vet. and it does a great job of keeping the dog teeth clean and breath fresh. The breath has a beef smell for about 20 min. but it goes completly away after that time. I recomend it.

The C.E.T. HEXtra Premium Oral Hygiene Chews with Chlorhexidine are super fantastic! Just ask my dogs! Buy the correct size for you dog and it will keep him/her busy for a while and will keep their teeth/gums healthy as well.  If your dogs are small (12-lbs and under) I'd recommend the "petite" size because they are made from "pressed" hide and are easier for them to digest.  My dog is 75-lbs and she needs the Extra Large ones.  We've been huge fans of HEXtra Chews for several years.  Do you and your dog a favor and keep them on hand!
The CET HEXtra Premium Oral Hygiene Chews with Chlorhexidine, Extra Large dog chews arrived timely and in new condition.  The pricing was very fair from this vendor and I would buy again.

I own four dogs, an African Ridgeback, a schnauzer, a mixed breed Chihuahua, and a cocker spaniel. It is a lot of work to try to brush all those teeth, so to compensate I give them the best dental chews money can buy.

You can see the differences product makes after the very first chew.
Vet recommended for dental health. Cost on line was half that in vets office. Product does not store well once dog has chewed on it.

My dog (a 65 pound shepherd mix) loves these and they really help with dog breath :)
I give them to her for an after dinner treat. I've tried other products, but these work the best.
My dogs absolutely love these bones. They are a little stinky when you first open the bag, but my dogs can't get enough of them!!! I would definitely recommend these. Your dog will thank you. : )
This product has help with plaque reduction on our dogs teeth.  It was recommended by our Vet.  It is a special treat for them - they love it!
Have been purchasing for several years and this product helps with cleaning teeth and satifies the "chewing" for my dog! Recommend!!

My vet started my french bulldog on these & they are great.  She wants the big ones, so we buy the extra large & one will actually last her 2 to 3 weeks.  They do not become the slimey soggy mess that a regular rawhide chew will, either.  Am giving some to all the dogs in our family  this year.
This is a good product, recommended by our vet.  I buy it from this vender at a much better price!  Always ships fast, and is well packaged.

We've been giving these chews to our dobies for at least the last four years.  Our (now) older dog had a dental cleaning and we started giving these chews about a week later.  The vet has never recommended a cleaning since.  We have a new pup (almost two years old now) and he still has super-model teeth thanks to these chews.  They do seem expensive, but I have struggled to find a chew that is this effective for a lower cost.  We give the dogs a chew every night because they won't leave us alone until they get one.  I do agree with the comments in one review about the bag containing various sizes and thicknesses, but after purchasing so many bags over time I feel like it all has averaged out (some bags do have large, thick chews and no smaller chews mixed in).

We didn't have any problems with this product and plan to order it again.  Pig and beef hide treats go too fast, so these keeping the pups busy a bit longer.  Nice addition to helping with caring for the dog teeth.

They seemed like good raw hide treats and my dogs thought they were pretty good but I don't really like the chlorine like smell. It makes me a bit queazy. I'll probably see if any friends want them. Also, I think it was a bit too much raw hide for my greyhounds. It didn't agree with their stomachs but I think that's an issue with rawhides in general not a particular problem with this product
These really do clean my dogs teeth.  I have used them for years.  Three months ago they cost 20.35 from Amazon, now they are 24.99.  Get real.

column9: BEWARE!!! GAVE MY DOG BAD DIARRHEA TIME AND TIME AGAIN....
column10: We bought these hoping they would be treats that lasted long and be good for the dog's teeth. I have a golden retriever that has NEVER had any sort of stomach issue. Anway after the second time giving my dog this chew she developed bad diarrhea and had to be taken out multiple times during the night which was a first. We didn't know what was wrong so put her on boiled chicken, rice, and pumpkin diet. Things firmed up after a day so we thought everything was better. Fast forward a few days and since we felt her stomach was better we gave her another one. What do you know? Diarrhea all through the night again! We went back to the chicken and rice diet till things firmed up. A week later we decided to give her another one. We had not yet put 2 and 2 together, we thought maybe there was some lingering issue and that is why her diarrhea had come back the 2nd time. Well after a week of solid poo we gave her another and just like that, diarrhea through the night again. We finally figured out it was the chews and we will no longer be giving our dogs these. We will be requesting a refund from the company.

column9: I buy these all the time!
column10: These are awesome. My dogs' teeth are super clean. Amazon was the only place I could find the extra-large size for my dogs.

column9: CET HEXtra Premium Oral Hygiene Chews
column10:
I can't speak for my pet but she seems to love C.E.T. HEXtra Premium Oral Hygiene Chews
and I see a noticable improvement of her teeth. I will order again as I love the ease of ordering and having them delivered directly to my home.
Chews are very enticing to our dog .. he does not like regular roll up hide toys.  The chews have a weird smell ... but our dog is not fussy about that  .....  Good product ... fairly expensive

My dogs LOVE these. I've got 2 big pups, and one of these can keep them busy for about 10 minutes (for blissful silence!). They smell terrible (we call them Stinky Chews), but the the dogs go crazy for them. According to the package, they are great for the dog's teeth, and our vet supports them. Our dogs also have had a GREAT dental history and have no plaque... even though we don't brush their teeth regularly. These are expensive, but worth it. I've bought at least 40 packages and will continue to do so. I can't beat Amazon's price anywhere IF I buy 2 packages at a time for the free shipping.

column9: Great product, but questionable quality control
column10: We have used this product for a very long time, however our most recent bag almost choked our dogs.  The pieces seem to fragment easily and the dogs will try to eat the chunks as they break off, leading to choking/gagging.  We have never had a problem with our dogs with these dental chews before, so it makes me question the recent quality.  It is possible that these came from  a bad batch as the company manufactures these in MEXICO.  Buyer beware.

column9: Fantastic Dental Product for my Dog
column10:
Have been using it for a 2 months. I must say that my dog needed a dental clean up with the build up that was leading to sore gums. In a few months of using it my dog's problem was gone. My dog's vet also agreed and was much surprised.

I am continuing to give this to my 100 lbs lab who happily chews this down. This is now the only dental product my dog will get.
I bought these for an elderly neighbor for her Sheltie.  The dog's teeth looked much better after two weeks chewing on these.

column9: even my vet says my dogs teeth are clean!
column10: We started using these about 4 years ago. The last time we took our dog in, the vet kept saying his teeth are really clean and is no longer asking us to get his teeth cleaned every time we take him in. My dog loves them and eats them for "dessert" each night :>)
My Pit Bull loves these chews.  They are the only rawhide he can digest properly.  Also, they help to keep his teeth clean.  Great product.

My dog loves these treats, and I love them because they took him from having breath I could smell across the room to breath I can smell if I get too close to his face. We buy extra large and use tinsnips to cut them in half for our small dog.

I buy these for my 100 pound Rhodesian/Lab mix who is a diabetic as well as my 60 pound pitt bull mix. They each get one every evening after my diabetic dog has had his shot as an alternative to the expensive teeth cleaning my vet recommended. By the way, my vet also recommended these chews. They are much cheaper on Amazon.com than at the vet's by far. The dogs really enjoy them and look forward to them every evening. I have noticed less tartar on their teeth as well as fresher breath.  Because I have large dogs, I buy the x-large size; however, the strips do not all come x-large. I get an assortment of small, medium, and large. The dogs do fine with the larger ones, but I find I have to watch the Rhodesian/Lab closely as he will tend to get choked on the smaller ones. This is also a disappointment to the dogs when one evening they get a chew that may last up to thirty minutes, and the next evening they get one that lasts five or ten minutes.

column9: I can't beleive my dog actually loves these things!
column10: Our Saint Bernard is 4 yrs. old and has always turned his nose up to rawhide or similar type chews.  Trying to brush his teeth is always a challenge.  A woman at the vets office (who had the same issues with her dogs), told me her dogs really enjoy these HEXtra chews.  She was absolutely right, they're great.  Our Saint loves 'em!  Not only do they keep him busy for awhile, but they actually do help keep his teeth clean . . . without fighting to brush them!  Whatever taste they have, it sure gets his attention.  An excellent product for maintaining your dogs oral hygiene.

I've been buying this product for a few years - paying way too much because I didn't know Amazon carried it!! My dog's teeth are in great condition b/c of them and he loves them. My vet agrees.
So glad I discovered that Amazon has them.
It works!  My dog loves it!!!!!  It works better than all other brands and/or items that I can find.  I plan to keep ordering it.  Thanks!

I got this product hoping that my dog will have something good to chew every day. But 15 min (if not less) after eating the chew, my dog had a diarrhea. Amazing! Never seen anything work so fast in that direction. So I had to take him out for a walk every 30 min that night. It was that bad! I thought I will send the product back, but started to read reviews. Found one saying that you should give this chew after the meal. Next time I gave my dog Kong stuffed with his regular food, and then half of the chew, and then more food in Kong. 15 min went ok, and he did not have to run outside. Later same day I did it again - food-chew-food, and he was fine. And I have to mention that he is a big boy and never had problems with his stomach before. And he eats different things.
Two things I can summarize - watch your dog during and after you give the chew, and give some food either before or right after the chew is gone.
Been buying these for at least eight years,  they must work well as I have a 10 year dog with teeth just as clean as the new puppy we have.  Would recommend to anyone !!!!

column9: The Best Bones I've used for years for our dogs
column10:
I haven't written reviews, only 1 or 2. Now is the time people should know how I feel about these C.E.T. HEXtra Premium Bones.
Our Vet, who sells those C.E.T. Bones, I tried one pack, but relized after seeing how good they are, I checked Amazon, and sure enough, they sold them, and at a better price.

Our Vet said when dogs reach 4 to 5 years old, regular rawhide does grind/chip their back teeth. That worrid me, but Vet said they're not bad, and introducted me to C.E.T. bones. Dogs have been on them for long time now, and I continue, oftened, to buy C.E.T. HEXtra Premium Oral... chews.

And when so much time passed, and recently Vet both dogs teeth, the older dog, her teeth are the same, they arn't worse. That to me is GREAT. Now I order from whoever has the better prices for C.E.T. chews. (NOTE:-I would check, though, make sure if you want to try these, make sure if you order $25.00 or over, that there's NO POSTAGE, some are 3rd parties, some 3rd parties offer free postage. Just letting all the Dog lovers know this.)

We've been using these Chews for so long, and when it's time to give each of them one, all I say is "how about a 'Chewy Bone'....WOW, no matter where they are in the house, they come a running, right to the closet in kitchen where I store them. They also, when I open the pantry, they run to other room, next to kitchen, and sit and wait, while their tails wag alot. That, at least to me, tells me they really like them.

So for anyone out there who wants to know what I think.....I think these C.E.T. HEXtra Premium Oral ARE THE BEST, and I would NOT recommend any other chewy bones, especially rawhide, or any other hard bone.

If this previous isn't enough to convince you, I don't know what else to say, other than "Maybe you should at least try 1 bag, even if you pay postage. I bet after that 1 bag, depending on size, which I buy the 30 extra large, which is much better price, they have small, medium, the right sizes for any dogs.

That's about it. If anyone wants to ask me questions, feel free to write/ask. I'll be happy to answer any questions.

i really like this product -- it beats brushing my dog's teeth. i've been using them for a year and they kekep her teeth in great condition. i first gave her them 2x a week, as she has a sensitive stomach and now she tolerates them daily.

These chews are very helpful in keeping our puppy's teeth clean. We cut them in thirds and give him a third at a time, because he's such a fast chewer.

Fortunately, they appear to be digestible, and he has not choked or gotten sick from them, unlike our other dog who had major issues with the Greenies brand.

The only draw back is that although we buy the extra-large chews, sometimes there are thin ones in the bunch. (Our puppy needs the thicker chews because he's such a strong chewer.)

I would give them a five star rating if they were all thick. But for the most part, they mostly contain the extra large size in the package.

Our golden retriever LOVES these!!  We've tried other dental treats/chews in the past without luck.  I took our dog to the vet to have her check out his teeth, and she gave us a sample of these to try.  Our dog practically ripped it out of my hands when I held it out for him to smell.  We give him one of these every other day, and his gums and teeth look AMAZING!  I'm really excited that he has a treat he loves that's also good for his dental hygiene.  I recommend this product to everyone with a dog!!

I have used this product for my Vizsla since he was a puppy. At the age of 6 1/2 because of this product he has very white and clean teeth without being brushed. This is also a special treat as whenever he is left home alone he gets a chew.  He senses when we are leaving and will stand by his treat table waiting for his chew.  I highly recommend this product.

My dogs love these hydes, they are the only hydes I will give my dogs because of their digestibility and the formula helps with their teeth.

This is also, by far, the best price I have seen for these hydes on Amazon!

column9: these arre vet reccomended, but i didnt want to pay double what i paid here!
column10: After having dental work done on all three of my dogs, the vet suggested these chews. The biggest problem now is that my dogs fight over them hah. No more dental work as of yet!
I continue to repurchase these chewies. My dog loves them and they clean her teeth and breath. The price is becoming expensive for the XL size, however, I may have to scale back to the large.

My dogs love the Virbac chewies. Both these and the regular kind. It helps to keep thier teeth and breath fresh.  I have two big Labs and they don't chew on anything except these (and my socks).  I would highly recommend them to anyone!

column9: Soo Good for Your Dog's Teeth
column10:
These chews are soo good for your dog's teeth, and most dogs will love them! My 58 lb. Blue Tick Coon Hound would eat them like candy, if we let her! But the limit is usually one per day (in this household).
I also work with a Veterinarian, and he says these are the next best thing to brushing your dog's teeth every day. Which sounds good tto clean off their teeth.
So if you want to keep your dog's teeth clean, and don't particularly brush them regularly (I don't-and I work with a Vet), these are a great alternative!!o me! He recommends feeding your dog "dinner" or a meal, then giving your dog one of these a little bit afterwards
These are terrific.... expensive from the Vet... but even then they are wsorth it... Keeps their teeth clean and healthy... and they love 'em.

column9: Great Dental Workout for Your Dog
column10: Great way to give your dog a healthy dental workout every day.  Every morning our dogs are waking us up to start their day with a HEXtra Chew, they even forgo eating to have their chew first thing in the morning.  We find that their teeth and breath are cleaner and fresher then every before and they each go to their own rug to enjoy their morning chew much like we enjoy our first cup of coffee in a favorite chair.
this came to me all melted couldnt even eat it had to throw it out was all over the bad it came in

I am not convinced this product is organic and will therefore not buy it again. The packaging on this product leaves me wondering how organic "Healthyway Organic Goji Berry" really is. There is no independent verification authority to confirm that this product is really organic. As far as I can tell, it is not certified organic by any authority other than the supplier and distributor. The 'Nutrition Facts" on the label have some strange entries like "Quantity of Heat" and "Thick Protein" which I do not understand. They sound like direct translations of Chinese to English. It is a "Product of China" as are most goji berries I have seen. My concern at a time when there is so much bad publicity related to food products coming out of China is that this product may be "organic" in name only and not in fact.

Ok, so I got these cause they were cheap. First time I ordered they were great! They tasted like all other dried goji berries I had tasted. Second time, they tasted a little bit musty. It is like they have been stored in plastic for a while, and now they taste artificial. They also have a very suspicious bright red color to them. Am I getting what I paid for?

It works great, it makes me feel better, it boosted up my metabolism, my doctor prescribed them to me. I have lost 25 Pounds while snacking on these berries, I would recommend anybody wanting to live an healthier life to try them out
I don't know how well the product works because I can't get past the nasty taste. I just can't stomach this.

They have sent me 2 bags with no labels on it. Kind of weird. Double check this. I like Goji Berries knowing that they are very healthy. But with those 2 bags I don't know. Why they are not in one bag 2 lbs with label???

I have taken Goji Berries for several years now. I used to buy them from Whole Foods. The price and quality here are a great value. I will definitely be purchasing more from this stellar. I take them daily and feel better for it. 100% recommend.

the berries look and taste as they should, although there is no way of telling if they are organic or not. my order came in two 1lb plastic re-seal able bags, the shipped with out a problem. also a good price for 4lbs of dry goji

Bought these before at a local health store that closed.  Decided to try online and was pleasantly pleased with the price and I just love to have jello with this things in it for a little extra pep.  I was really surprised how quickly they arrived.
if you are into healthy eating, this a must have product. Great for snack, add on to shakes and salads. Also considered a super food in many books.

I am so disappointed, these berries have a very bad aftertaste. I got a little nauseous after eating about an ounce...kinda makes me worry...Im going to try them for a few more days if i get nauseous one more time im going to attempt to return...One very odd thing...i didnt get any paperwork w/ this order, so returning may be a huge hassle...

I read about these for weight loss among other benefits and thought I'd try them.  Make sure you know they are related to the tomato and chili pepper more than a normal "berry" because they taste more like a bit of dried tomato than a sweet fruit.  Easy to lose weight with them when they taste like dried tomato- make it your only available food :)

I liked the goji berries the first time I ordered these but the 2nd time they tasked a bit stale.  Next time I plan to buy them somewhere else.  When they are fresh - they taste great!  They are great to add to water, smoothies, desserts, fruit bowls, etc

I purchased these mainly to put into raw energy bars. When i received them and saw the packaging i understood what other reviews meant... Leaves you wondering just How Organic these are. I did a comparison taste with left over Gojis i had from Navitas, and i could barely tell a difference between the 2. I think for the price these are great. But am a little doubtful that they are organic.

column9: An everyday use in my smoothie
column10: I drink an all-organic raw fruit and veggie smoothie every morning and I add the goji berries.  I will order this again as I am almost out.  I am into superfoods and I love this for my immune system and have gotten a Grade A health report from my doctor.  I will never make a smoothie without this superfood.

I've tried several brands of chili powder, and this one is by far the tastiest and most interesting. I love that it has a bit of cinnamon and cloves to compliment the heat of the chile peppers, and it's not too hot for my taste. It's also great as a seasoning for stuffed winter squash, it gives oven fries a nice kick, and it's perfect on baked sweet potatoes. I will probably cry if this product is ever discontinued!

I use this on everything it seems.  Makes great chili, add it to rice, sprinkle over chicken or turkey for flavor.  Adds great flavor without added salt or calories.  My kids ask for "spicy rice"  all the time.  The price on Amazon, when I purchased on subscribe, was better than my local healthy market.  Only one place near me carries this brand, and it is better tasting than all the others I have tried.

I bought this rub at a food show in DC recently and have been absolutely hooked ever since. My girlfriend and I work long days and don't have much time to prep dinner, so it is nice to know I can come home, sprinkle some of this on a piece of meat, chicken, veggies or whatever, throw it in a pan and have a freaking amazing tasting dinner with little to no effort.  Needless to say, it didn't take long for me to burn through my first three cans and now I am back for more.  Thank you Rub Joe!!

I've purchased several juice flavors from this brand, organic and non-organic and have not been disappointed. I bought the organic version at harris teeter which is a grocery store chain for four ninety nine. The juice is not real sweet, almost like eating a mouthful of pitted bing cherries without having to chew. I also add it to a lot of things for flavor and color swirls, namely Oetker's organic vanilla pudding, yellow cake mix, white frosting, pancake mix, and lemon poppy-seed muffins. Thus far Amazon has the best prices on Oetker products for my area. This juice is also very good to freeze as popsicles. I've thought about making a sorbet, but haven't yet.

column9: Excellent Product, Just Too Pricey For Me
column10: Perfect for anyone who wants to keep gout at bay. It tastes good too, not sweet at all. If only i could afford to buy it on a regular basis. By regular basis i mean more than one case a month. If your wallet (or purse) allows it, by all means buy it.
Great tasting Cherry Juice! Packaged well and shipped promptly. Each bottle in its own foam pocket. What's not to like?! Try it, you'll like it, I did.

I bought this juice from Amazon just last month and went around local supermarkets looking for it and Harris Teeter has it for only $5 a bottle and Amazon's charging $8 for one!! That's highway robbery. They should really correct the pricing. The juice itself I find no fault and taste great. Always shop around, not everything on Amazon is a bargain!

column9: Great juice, but too expensive on Amazon
column10: I bought this cherry juice from a local Harris Twitter and loved it.  It taste very fresh, clearly better than juice reconstituted from concentrate.  But it's too expensive here at Amazon!  I think I bought it for $6-7/bottle from the local store.  Was hoping to find it here cheaper but quite the opposite.  Disappointed.

column9: Best Juice Ever Delivered to Your Door!
column10: This, and all the Lakewood, PURE, Organic Juices (that I have tried), are absolutely, the BEST available. Each juice tastes like the ripe fruit actually tastes, but you can stock up on it! Think of having a case of this juice in a natural disaster, when water may not even be available.  It is precious with nutrients AND water that comes in the juice! To have AMAZON deliver this to your door FREE is a miracle, especially for those who can't get out, or get it up the stairs if shopping at a local store. Time is valuable too, as is fuel to drive around. I NEED this juice for my health and immune system.  Thank God for AMAZON!  They have everything I look for!
Great juice. Is a great help to health.  The road to good health is paved with good intestines.

column9: Good to mix, boosts immune system
column10: My pediatrician sent me on an online hunt for immune boosters for my son's diet when he contracted mono at age six--specifically for this product among a few others.  After ordering it and trying it out as chocolate milk, we found we actually preferred it as a "mix-in" type of powder rather than stand alone chocolate milk.  It worked mixed with milk, but turns pretty greenish after a few minutes and that was a visual turn-off for my six year old and for me to be honest.  Mixed in with pudding, yogurt, oatmeal (Mom was a huge hit the morning I had the chocolate oatmeal a-ha moment) and to make chocolate peanut butter banana smoothies, it has become a daily staple in our home.  We also use the fruit flavored mixed with greek vanilla yogurt and smoothies--it tastes sweeter to me, and is the second favorite.  Just a heads up for Mom's who may not be aware of what these super concentrated dark veggies and berries will do upon exit...don't panic when you see the end result in the toilet as unusually dark.

Things I love about this product:
-Only 1 gram of sugar per serving
-Tastes great
-Made with decaffeinated chocolate
-Only 21 calories

It's great for both kids and adults who love chocolate milk but want something healthier. It tastes like ovaltine to me and that just makes it even better!

column9: Amazing Grass is great for kids and adults alike.
column10:
This product is wonderful! My kids love it because it tastes like a chocolate drink and it is loaded with healthy vegetables and nutrients.
I was so glad to find a way to get some extra vegetables in their daily diet and mine as well. It is also easy to fix-just add water and stir for a few seconds and there you are!

column9: Kidz superfood a great food booster
column10: I have been using this product for the last 6 months with my 20 month old toddler.  We do not use it in her milk or water because she likes drinking them but we do use this product with her plain yogurt and with her 8 grain hot cereal.  She loves it!  Chocolate yogurt and oatmeal, sweet!!  I like the added vitamins from veggies that it offers, and low sugar content! I found that if I can find this with free shipping it is about 3 dollars cheaper then what I can buy it for in the store.

I bought this looking for a healthier alternative for chocolate milk.  Unfortunately the kids don't like it at all, and I have to admit, I didn't really care for it either.  I had a hard time getting it mixed in, so it tasted grainy.  I tried mixing it in the blender for smoothies and the blender couldn't even get it mixed in.  I've been able to sneak it into pancake mix and oatmeal, just to use it up, but I won't be buying it again.  I give it 3 stars for nutritional value.

column9: Taste great my 3 year old loves it
column10: When my daughter was one she had really bad ear infections. The doctor wanted me to take her to get tubes but i refused, put her on greens when she was one and a half and has not gotten sick since. Best thing ever. Amazon has the best price to , my health food store sells them for $[...].

My husband and I trialed this powder as adults, and we found it quite tasty when blended into smoothies. I highly recommend it as a nutrition "booster" for smoothies, particularly for picky kids. The ingredient profile is awesome.

There are just a few reasons why I would purchase the Berry version over this one. The chocolate has soymilk powder, and we try to keep soy consumption low (the berry version doesn't). I didn't really like the taste of the chocolate when simply added to water, it needed more. In general, we liked the flavor of the berry a bit better, and the berry version has both prebiotics and probiotics in the ingredients, but the chocolate doesn't.

Nonetheless, if you or your child is a chocolate fan, you really can't go wrong with this awesome superfood mix!

column9: I like it but my kids don't
column10: I think it tastes great but my kids don't like the way it looks or tastes.  I'll drink it and use it in smoothies for myself, happily.

My daughter will not eat fruits or veggies, very very pick eater, so I mix it with her regular chocolate milk. At least she is drinking all the good stuff that comes in this superfood mix.
Buying it for the second time. I would recommend.
Hard to mix so just mix one scoop with a tiny bit of whatever liquid you using, smooth it out, then pour the rest of the liquid.
I was very pleased with this product!! My fussy 3 yr old son loved it in his smoothies! Great way to sneak in something healthy into a kid's diet!

column9: wish the kids would drink it
column10: This product is great!  When mixed with milk it becomes a slightly less sweet chocolate milk.  It is hardly gritty like some other superfoods may be and you even get a hint of the berry flavor.  Unfortunately, my kids who are both over 10, will not drink it.  They take a few  sips but never want to finish it.  I've even added additional chocolate syrup but they don't care for it.  It reminds me of Ovaltine, which, when I was a kid, I didn't like as much as Quick...  great product - every kid is different so you will just have to try it and see.  Know that if the kids don't like it, an adult surely would.

My toddler rarely eats vegetables so giving him this mixed in his milk makes us both feel better!  I love that the chocolate is decaffeinated and that there is only one gram of sugar per serving compared to ten or twenty grams per serving in some other chocolate milk mixes.

I have been using this protein mix for several years even though I'm not a kid anymore (just at heart!) I love the taste - the list of ingredients is amazing and you will NOT find a better price anywhere than Amazon

I never would have tried this product if they weren't sampling it at Whole Foods.  I have been hooked ever since.  Even though it is made for kids, I drink it every day with chocolate soy milk.  It gives me something sweet while providing vital nutrients.  Love it!
Our toddler already doesn't like veggies, so we need to sneak them in however we can. This works good. Our two year old loves it.

My kids seriously think this is chocolate milk.  I can smell the difference but they love it.  My almost 2 year old got the cup from her brother and got in MAYBE 2 sips and the whole day her tummy was messed up after that.  So I wouldnt give it to the little ones.  But my older 2 love it.

I am a college student of health sciences and the mother to a 3 yr old toddler. I personally show very little response to "placebo effect" situations and I am a true skeptic at heart. I originally found the "kid" version of this product for my daughter while searching for something to boost her immune system. I spent hours on the computer researching the ingredients of these products. I decided to try the adult version for myself and I can honestly say that the Amazing Grass Superfood Powders have made a huge improvement in both of our lives.

My daughter attends daycare and with that setting comes frequent colds/flus, some serious. She spent the better part of each month with varying degrees of sickness. Since we have using the Superfood Powders (months), neither she nor I have gotten sick. We spent time with my parents who were both very ill while she and I remained in good health. Her time spent at daycare has not been reduced but she is now very rarely sick. I can only recall one time since we started using this product and her sneezing/runny nose only lasted for one day. Since no other variable in our lives has been changed, I can only attribute this to the use of Amazing Grass.

It is difficult to make sure that a child is getting all of the necessary nutrients they need in their diet. Amazing Grass takes care of that. I feel better knowing that when my daughter goes through her "picky eating" stages, she is still getting the vitamins and nutrients her body needs to stay healthy. I mix 1 scoop of her powder with approx 8oz of milk and 1 tsp Ovaltine...I have never had any trouble getting her to drink it. She asks for her "choco milk" at least twice per day!

Overall, EXCELLENT product! I am getting ready to purchase my 4th jar!

column9: I love this.. I just wish my daughter did!
column10:
I originally bought this for my 3 year old who is very picky about textures in her food/drinks and will go days without eating anything but milk. When I found this I thought it would be great because she loves chocolate milk and this is highly nutritious so I ordered it. When I made a cup of this with milk it seemed like it needed more chocolate flavor so I added ovaltine and it was delicious. So I hid it in a sippy cup so she wouldn't see the tiny green particles floating on top and I didn't tell her anything was different about it but as soon as she started drinking it she started gagging and cried "I don't like this seedy chocolate milk!"

Not wanting to waste it my husband and I have been drinking it. We have both noticed that when we drink it we feel really good all day! So if your child doesn't have a problem with textures then I think this product would be great for you!

column9: Great tasting it is not, but come on, it's a bunch of vegetables
column10: I'm really surprised by the number of people who think this makes a great tasting drink.  I'm also surprised by the number of people who think this resembles anything close to chocolate milk.  Yuck!  That being said, I think it's a GREAT product (assuming that it does contain the nutrients it claims to).  I have a 6 year old son and a 3 year old daughter.  They aren't fans of drinking this stuff in milk straight up (I've tried to drink it and can't do it) so I use that milk with their cereal.  They call it their 'vegetable milk' and have become accustomed to it in their cereal.  It does start to separate after a few minutes so the milk has a grainy, green texture to it.  But, again, they get used to it and, for kids who aren't begging to eat their veggies every day, this is a great way to get more nutrients in to their growing bodies.
My kids don't like the taste so i have been drinking it. So far I see no difference and it taste bad. I got blender and make smoothies, my kids like those alot more.
My children enjoyed drinking this.  It was a simple no fuss way to incorporate veggies into their diet.
My son has been drinking this since he was a year old and loves it. No complaints here!

column9: seal was broken on arrival - powder all over in box
column10: I really wanted to try this for my daughter.  Unfortunately it arrived with the seal broken and powder spilled out into the box.  I tried to process a return to get a new sealed container but this item is ineligible for returns.  I left packaging feedback about the issue and have not gotten a response.  I really hope I can get a replacement, this stuff is not cheap.  I gave this one star because we could not try it.  I will update if we get a replacement and can try it.  We have used the berry flavor.  I think it tastes terrible because it is very very sweet with an artificial sweet taste but my daughter will eat it mixed with plain unsweetened apple sauce.

I had very high expectation with this product, but the first cup I gave my son, he got sick with the taste and then developed aversion towards all chocolate products. I am consuming this product for the family now.

This is a very nice oil with a moderately fruity flavor.  Does not have much of a peppery finish and is ideal for those who are looking for a smooth olive oil that does not finish with a distinct burn.  Good for dipping and salads.

column4: Heather L. Parisi "Robert and Heather Parisi"
column9: TERRIFIC TASTE AND HEALTH BENEFITS TOO  --  SMALL SIZE ASSURES FRESHNESS WHEN YOU USE IT!
column10:
IN A NUTSHELL:

This Goya "EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL" is one of the smartest buys one can make. This is "Extra-Virgin Olive Oil, Imported from Spain and is stated to be "All Natural & Cold Pressed". Bear in mind that "All Natural" is not "Certified Organic".

WHAT EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE IS USED FOR:

That being said, this is not an oil for cooking, as it has a very low smoke point. It is excellent for salads and for marinating and boasts a pretty low acid level. For cooking try their "Extra Light" product as it has a much higher smoke point.

HEALTH BENEFITS:

PROVEN PROTECTION AGAINST ATHEROSCLEROSIS:

Eating foods high in alpha-linolenic acid (ALA), [found in Olive, canola & flaxseed oil] will increase the blood levels of omega-3 fatty acids. ALA has been shown to confer a large measure of protection against atherosclerosis. As part of the "Mediterranean" diet, researchers used products high in ALA, and found that the ALA reduced the risk of dying from heart disease by 70% over the first 27 months.

Canola and Peanut oil also contain large amounts of ALA and are similarly cardio-protective. The presence of a larger proportion of "mono-saturated fats" is central to the cardio-protective properties of the oil.

-----*- NO Cholesterol -- -*- No Trans-Fat

WHICH SIZE IS BEST FOR YOU?

This and most of their conventional oils are available at most groceries and this exact product sells for about $3. for 8 ounces. However, it does vary regional and depending on the packaging [bottle or tin] may cost somewhat less by volume. Bear in mind, that Olive will become rancid if you store it for prolonged periods. You can, however, extend this period by keeping the oil in a cool and dry place, preferably dark. Also, don't buy the largest containers unless you can finish them within 1-2 months. Smaller containers like this 8 ounce bottle may be more costly per volume than the liter or gallon size containers, but the oil will be fresh when you use it and that is critical.

[I AM NOT AFFILIATED WITH ANY PRODUCT OR COMPANY]
A bold and peppery banana blitz. Seriously, tastes like olives with fresh cut bananas. Great for dipping and finishing, esp. salads.

Kinda wish they came in larger sizes so there would not be all these little glass-bottles left-over, but I prefere the glass containers to plastic, and I cannot find better taste or quality, so I will happily make-do.

GREAT COOKING OIL AND GREAT FOR DIPPING, ALTHOUGHT I SHOULD HAVE BOUGHT IT FROM GRISTEDES, MUCH LESS AND MUCH FASTER SERVICE SO I HEAR. BOUGHT IT FROM ANOTHER SELLER AND PAID ALMOST 2X THE AMOUNT WILL CHECK PRICES NEXT TIME (AND LISTEN TO MY DAUGHTER)
I'm not an expert on olive oil but this is the best Iv'e ever tasted. You can taste it right out of the bottle and itsgreat. No after taste whatsoever. Ray

My kitty eats all the flavors of Natural Balance Platefulls on rotation, and loves all of them equally. He gets dry food in the morning, and a pouch for dinner every night. His coat is GORGEOUSLY soft and shiny, and these pouches don't give him nasty gas or rowdy bad breath like some other canned/pouch foods. When I first opened a pouch, I saw that it had peas and carrots in it, and I figured those would be left behind in the bowl. Cats just...don't eat vegetables. To my surprise, the bowl was licked clean! And after 3 months, he still licks the bowl clean every night!

My cats prefer their wet food to be the kind that is chunks in gravy and not the pate kind. They normally love all of the varieties of Natural Balance's Platefulls, but they DO NOT LIKE the salmon, tuna, chicken, and shrimp flavor. They only lick the gravy off and leave the chunks to dry out. Also, someone seems to get a sick tummy more often since we got this package. So, it's a waste of my money.

My cat has been eating this for about 2 months. It seems every 3-5 months or so, she gets bored with whatever wet food I give her (even when I get different flavors of the same brand). This is brand 3. I was very skeptical that she would ignore the bits of veggie, but never fear - she cleans her bowl! The only thing I would say as a slight downside - I usually have to add a bit of water to the packet to get all the pieces and gravy out and into my impatient feline.
I had this product before, but forgot how unimpressed I was.  I stupidly ordered it again, same results. Big mouthwatering name, with less than Cracker Jack taste.I will make sure not to order again.

My wife got me these at Whole Foods for $4.99.
Great product!

Why does Amazon want over $8 a bag?

Somebody else, not me!

Back to Nature mixed nuts actually tasted very nice, the only additional ingredient was sea salt.  I would had bought this product again, however the price is a little high.  You could purchase cashews, almonds and pistachios separate and mix yourself for probably a few bucks cheaper per bag.

column9: Ridiculously overpriced on Amazon but great product hence the 1 star
column10: Crunchy, not too salty, always very fresh when I've bought these at Publix. Publix has them on sale from time to time for $4.  Whole foods price is usually around $5. No idea why you buy 3 and pay about 100% more.  Amazon needs to evaluate the price- perhaps should be a 8 pack for the same price.

Now you think for 60 cents an oz. the company could get better packaging.....BUT NOOOO....one bag burst in box and was all over the bottom of box...when I saw this mess...I yell...OH NUTS...there goes $6......It just drove me nuts to see that. All that weeping and whaling...made me go...you guessed it....kookoo...
This mix of nuts is perfect.  Just the right amount of salt and great flavor!  I have my auto-delivered so that I'm never without.
This was great for me, since this item sells out at my local store and can not count on getting this particular mix when I want it.
All the nuts in this mix tasted really good and I saw they were healthy for you but the pricing is way too much for me to buy again.

column9: BACK TO NATURE CASHEW,ALMOND AND PISTACHIO 10 OZ.
column10: THE BACK TO NATURE CASHEW,ALMOND AND PISTACHIO MIX IS DELICIOUS, THE COMBINATION OF THE THREE NUTS ARE REALLY GOOD, THEY SATIFIY YOUR CRAVING AND ALSO USE SEA SALT AND NO ADDED OILS.  NEED TO ORDER SOME MORE

column9: The only nuts I snack on!
column10: Perfect snack - not too oily, perfectly salted, good mix ratios (meaning its not all almonds), almost all the nuts remained whole even through shipping process, and price/convenience is awesome with Sub&Save. Highly recommend any flavor from this company, but this is my fav!
Back to Nature nuts are great the ones I really love are the almond, cashew and pistachios---not very salty just healthy nuts--I will buy them again and again.

column9: bad experience buying mixed nuts online for the first time
column10:
The Pack of 3 arrived but by the look of them they don't seem to be worth the price. A bit pricey, and may as well get mixed nuts from local grocery supermarkets, I thought. Not happy.

One of the three packs came half-filled, making it a pouch with less than 5 Ounce of mixed nuts, although the pouch is intact so I guess that was a faulty product. Not happy times 2.

One of the two seemingly 10 Ounce pouches has a date-like print "03 26 13 GB", but I came across quite a few gone-bad pistachio nuts which you can't tell until you've tasted them. Not happy times 3.

Overall, I probably won't buy this again.
These nuts are so delicious with just a hint of sea salt. Good as topping on icecream or cereal.  Taste is just right.

Read the description of product and thought it sounded good.  Have always eaten cashews, almonds and pistachios with no reaction.  Liked the fact that it had no added oils.  However, after first eating a small handful I began to itch and itch and itch.  So I waited a day and tried 5 and again I itched and itched.  I find it hard to believe that with the ingredients of nuts and sea salt that I would find myself reacting so much.  There has to be somethng more to this product than nuts and salt since I have never reacted to these ingredients before.  Be warned.
Very similar to Kellog's Nutrigrain Cereal Bars but a little more tart.  The kids love them as a snack or quick meal on the go.
This product did not taste like we had expected from sampling other plum sauces.  Did not like this one at all.  We would not purchase this item again.

I love these lollipops. They are only 80 calories and last a long time, at least 20 minutes.  I am a weight watcher so I really am careful about what I eat and find these hit the spot.  The only problem I have is trying to decide which flavor to chose.  I got a sample of one of the lollipops at Christmas at the mall and loved it.  I tried to find a place near me who sells them but they are not close by so I order from Amazon.com  I have ordered twice so far and been happy with the product and the service.

See's candy is exceptionally good. It is one of the best candies available. It was given at Christmas to relatives who truely enjoyed it. The shipping cost was criminal! I realize the cost of shipping has gone up in recent months. The See's candy company is charging too much for shipping and handling. I do not plan to buy any additional candy in the future because of this problem.

column9: A new traditional stocking stuffer in our house!
column10: This is now a new stocking stuffer in our house.  How great and what a fun treat.  We love them!
These are great! I can't help but get these any time I can.  My co-workers love when I bring them back from trips!
These are the tastiest lollipops in the world. I love the vanilla and carmel ones. The chocolate ones are great if you are a dark chocolate fan.

the reason for the poor evaluation is not because of the item. The lollipops are wonderful BUT, a 1 lb 5 oz box which costs $16.20 has a shipping cost of $15.25!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Almost the same as the cost of the item.

If you go to the website (www.sees.com) in the shipping section you will see that there are a variety of shipping costs depending upon when you want the item. I just paid $7.25 rather than $15.25 and I'll have to wait a week which is probably as long as I'd have to wait if I had ordered the box from Amazon since there is a disclaimer that says "Processing takes an additional 2 to 3 days for orders from this seller"

Don't get cheated!

Seriously the best lollipops you will ever taste! Makes great gifts for others as well as yourself. Someone brought them into my workplace and I have been addicted ever since. I usually crave an afternoon sweet and they are a perfect yummy afternoon snack.

My friend went to San Fran and gave me one of each lollypops to try. Well, I liked them all. When I found out they were only 80 calories I had to have them. I was VERY happy to see that Amazon carries them.

I ordered these Lemonheads through Amazon as I could not find them locally and my Mom constantly used them. She said they kept her dry mouth at bay.
Very fast service and Mom was tickled with them

These peace signs looked great on my daughters birthday cupcakes.  My order arrived in broken pieces and the company promptly sent another order. It also had breakage but between the two shipments we had enough to cover all of our treats.  Order earlier then you need them.

column9: Bait & Switch - these are good for bait, not eating!
column10:
These are NOT true Cross-Pack sardines, and they are Scottish, not Norwegian.
These are very large sardines with the front 1/3 cut-off, so they'd fit in the tin cross-wise.
I have eaten hundreds of 2-layer tins from Season and King Oscar, and these are clearly inferior.
Cross-Pack is supposed to be the finest, rarest grade - these aren't that.
If you see these in a store, read the back label carefully!
Season used to be a good brand - what a shame.

column9: Among the best if not the best!
column10: After my brother, a film animator formerly with the Walt Disney Company, made a TV commercial for Season Brand Sardines I decided to try the product and have been a lover of the tiny (Brisling) variety since then.  This is now more than 20 years ago.  They are packed in various sauces and oils but my favorite is pure olive oil and lightly smoked, wild caught from the cold waters off Scotland.  I cannot imagine doing better than that.  Most sardine lovers whether they eat them for health (they contain over 2,500mg of Omega 3 fatty acids) or just as a wonderful gourmet food love the tiny ones.  The taste is nut-like and delicious.  I like them best in a sandwich of toasted, seeded Jewish rye with Romaine lettuce.  There's nothing else needed.

column9: Well, now I know where the term "packed like sardines" comes from.
column10:
So, my favorite sardine supplier stopped for a while and I decided to try some other brands and configurations. These are among the most expensive, but they were a pleasant surprise. I understand why so many sardine eaters just get these little ones. There was eighteen of the little fish in the can I just ate!

I suppose the best I can do to describe the taste comparison with the big ones I'm more accustomed to is that the big ones have a sort of tuna-ish taste whereas these tend to taste a bit more like clams or oysters. The smell is fishy as ever, but the taste is more mild. Quite nice actually.

column9: The MORE layers, the smaller; the SMALLER the better.
column10:
Anyone that R=E=A=L=L=Y likes SARDINES prefers the little-bitty ones.
I used to buy a brand that sold "three-layer" sardines.
Only seen the SINGLE or DOUBLE -layer variety, lately... and, of course,
the single-layer ones don't actually ADVERTISE the fact as they are just
big chunks of chum-like [bait] fish.
I understand that the reason I CANNOT find three-layer sardines is be-
cause they are now known as either "tiny" or "cross-packed" sardines.
.................................................................................................
Sardines are healthy because of the oil; and the bones supply calcium
--- I suppose --- hell, I just like them... The little ones, I mean.
I'll just have to remember that the SMALL [good!] ones are now called
"cross-pack".
.................................................................................................

terrible - not tiny as described - had 19 in can. they are cross packed, but should have 30 -32 in can to be the real good ones. KING OSCAR  are the best of all - if you can find them. no more of these for me  (SEASONS)ever.
Trust me, if you are into sardines, these are some of the best. Great flavor and high quality product. You won't be disappointed.
Very fine quality with a great presentation. They are as good as any small sardine I have eaten.

column9: When you need a lift or help with motion sickness
column10: Uncle Lee's Tea can be difficult to find where I live.  I keep some of this tea a work.  It helps brighten the day and keep me motivated.  If you enjoying warming tea do this one.  This is also the tea I travel with.  It has helped me with motion sickness.

I drink this tea all winter long.  It is my favorite of all hot teas.  It is best chai tea I've found.  I drink mine without any sugar or milk in it so it's zero calories.  I've also heard people say how good it is with milk and a little sugar.  I can't find this anywhere in Colorado Springs so I always order it online.

column9: love this! great to have on hand
column10: I bought the Gallon Jug of this about 7 months ago it is great to have on hand. This has a very fresh tasting tomato flavor and re-hydrates easily. I use it to make instant tomato soup, for sauces and in salsa as well as adding to soups, stews, and every where else that one might want some tomato  flavor.  Very easy to adjust texture  can be tomato paste or juice  and is fun to experiment with I even made little tomato balls as a kind of oddball appetizer and everyone who tried them was blown away. Very light weight dry does pack down a bit but has stayed dry in the jug with no problems. This is a  great staple for both daily use and food storage.  The tomato powder hasappeal for both  old fashioned homey nostalgia and a bit of Jetsons O wow!edge too.
I absolutely love it. Everything I've added it to tastes better, more like fresh tomato than any other I've tried. It can make even canned tomato sauce good. Seems to last a long time too.

column9: Surprising flavor, a star on pizza
column10:
I bought this mainly out of curiousity, and it sat on the shelf for a while until I started experimenting with it. It has a very concentrated tomato flavor, so if you are looking for a quick way to impart more tomato flavor to a dish, this will do it. Add a little at a time until you get to know how it works.

But my favorite way to use it has been on home made pizza in place of tomato sauce. A light sprinkling before baking yields a delicious tomato flavor without the soggy crust that sauce can often create. Just sprinkle it on the pizza dough, add oregano and any other herbs and spices,your favorite toppings and bake as usual.

Talk about the added triple Tomato kick this is the product!!!
I love this stuff Best powder I've tried hands down. Can be added to any
recipe that calls for tomato or soups or even season. Since I'm a RAW Vegan
I use this a lot ;)

This was our first time trying the tomato powder and we are very happy with it, as it s so versatile in many different ways. We like it for adding to soups and other cooking and we have even mixed with water and drank some and it would even make tomato soup. Try it I think you will like it.

This is very good tomato powder.  I have used it every day to supplement my vegetable intake.  I sprinkle it on my food.  I have made sauce with it.  I still have plenty and I use it every day.  I plan to buy more.  I'm very happy with it.  I  recommend it.

column9: love it...should be in every kitchen..so much flavor!
column10: do you love tomatoes? This is like a super concentration of tomato flavor that you can add to anything. Like a meaty flavor in a beef stew, add this! Look it up, tomato paste / powder brings out the meaty flavor in beef. We add it to omelettes, crock pot beef dishes, kale chips... it works well in many recipes...and it never goes bad like a store bought tomato. Best of all....the price. Have you seen the price of tomato paste? This is how they make it... and you skip the middle man. makes me smile, how about you?

I saw this on the Dr. Oz show and ordered it.  I have diabetes and have been looking for a natural sweetener that doesn't send my blood glucose through the roof and that tastes good.  I think this is it!  I have tried this for baking, in my coffee and oatmeal and it is really great tasting.  No sugar spikes either!  Now I can have a brownie occasionally.

After watching Dr Oz show, immediately I called several of my local store in order to get several teas that had been shared on the show. However with much disguise and disappointment, I couldn't find anyone of the teas nor Coconut Palm Sugar.  I went online thru eBay and then Amazon and found most of the items that I had been looking for. The seller ship quickly and shipped the actual products. I love the the products I received.
As Seen on Dr. OZ! Organic Coconut Palm Sugar - 1lb bag This organic coconut palm sugar tastes great. Exactly like cane sugar.
Tastes like brown sugar.  Use it wherever it calls for brown sugar in recipes and to sweeten drinks.  Great product.

column9: Life is just a bit sweeter
column10: I was channel surfing and purely by chance I landed on the Dr. OZ show.  As his guest tried different holistic weight loss products, I was particularly intrigued by this product.  I quickly ordered a couple of bags so I wouldn't forget to do it and I've been hooked since then.  Its great in just about anything that you would normally use sugar.  I'm an avid coffee drinker, so I particularly enjoy it's aroma and the hint of nutty flavor it adds to my sacred beverage.  Bye Bye regular sugar!

GREAT SUGAR. SWEET, GREAT TASTING. USED IN DRINKS, CEREALS, AND COOKING.
THE CARMEL TASTE IT SAYS IT HAS, I DIDN'T REALLY FIND. I FOUND IT HAD NO TASTE
WHEN PUT IN MY FOOD. SWEET WITH ALL THE RIGHT STUFF. WILL GET AGAIN!!!
I really does not taste any different than sugar. It is like brown sugar and I put into a glass container, it stays fresh.

TThis product is the best. I have two friendship will be ordering the coconut palm sugar. I do not buy regular sugar anymore. Amazon is the new shopping tool for me. My products are received before the company stated day of arrival Thanks.
small pkg .  tastes ok.  shipping charges are outragious.  bought this product to maintain blood sugar levels throughout the day. tried it on oatmeal, havent tried cooking with it yet

column9: Ok, but not sure if I would purchase again
column10: I purchased this item for my mom who has type 2 diabetes. Her glucose level for the most part, remained in the normal range using this product as a sweetener in her tea. Although this product appears to work well in preventing sugar spikes, my two issues with it is, (1) the ridiculous shipping cost and (2)it does not have a favorable taste with all tea. I have not tried using it in baking goods, so I can not comment on that, at this time.
I put some in my morning joe, and I wasn't able to drink it.  The flavor was terrible.  I haven't baked with it yet so I dont't know if will taste better in baked goods or not.

The palm sugar is okay.  I was hoping it would be more like a granulated type sugar.  It's very clumpy and I constantly have to break the clumps apart.  But the flavor is great, and I find I don't need very much.  I have only used it in my coffee so far.

Very Good for baking.  I love that it has a low glycemic index, so not so bad for diabetics.  It has sort of a molassas taste to it, so it's especially good for replacing brown sugar.  I would purchase it again.

The Coconut Palm Sugar wasn't too bad as a substitute for baking, however, it is significantly less sweet then  white sugar. I enjoyed that it wasn't as sweet but for those that want a sweet pastry, you may need to readjust the amount when using the coconut palm sugar. Also, it is hard to make a syrup out of it and melts quite a bit faster than white sugar.
This is a very good product. I feel healthier. I dont use as much of this product as I do usual sugar.

column9: OK, this is not a Jewish company alright?
column10:
LOL Don't be intimidated by all these exotic Goya products, the company
is actually the oldest and most revered of all the commercial Spanish foods
companies and Chimichurri can best be described as Argentine Pesto.

This is my favorite Chimichurri sauce, and its properly made with olive oil.
But not just any olive oil....Spanish Extra Virgin Olive Oil and in my book
it just doesn't get any better than that. (note: avoid similar products made
with vegetable oil)

Following the traditional recipe, this makes a delicious dressing for any
grilled meat including burgers and sausages. But where this really shines
is as a marinade rather than a finisher. This has a tangy herbaceous flavor
and you will taste the blend of garlic, parsley, onion, olive oil, apple cider
vinegar, oregano and white pepper. Want more flavor, add your own herbs or
garlic but I think this blend is perfect right out of the jar.

It can also be used as a spread with bread or to add a boost to vegetables,
salads and soups. And while mainly used for steak, this stuff works really
well on fish and grilled shrimp too or for making Bruchetta, or even just
with cheese and crackers. Its very versatile and you will find any number
of uses for this terrific concoction.

IMO, this is the Heavyweight Champ of commercial Chimichurri sauces.
This is the best condensed milk I've ever tasted!I use it to make my own version of Irish Cream and it's great!

I tried this at Starbucks and loved it (even though theirs is different), so I brew up a container and mix it with decaf green tea and it is very refreshing and fruity. Healthy for your too, give it a try instead of sugary fruit punch for kids, brew up use your favorite sweetner and lots of ice. Really good.Davidson's Tea Bulk, Herb Pure Org Hibiscus, 16-Ounce Bag

column9: Love it with a good squeeze of fresh lime on ice..when its 112 degrees outside
column10: Looking for a way to drink more un-sugared liquids so I went with a bulk tea that folks say is a very healthy one (Hibiscus). I make it real strong and add a lot of fresh lime.  It has been a lifesaver with temperatures here in Austin Texas in the 105-112 range these last couple of months.
This is the best Hibiscus tea I tried. It contains whole hibiscus flowers, not dust and dirt like many bagged teas, and the taste is wonderful. The cost is also much less than tea bags.

I'm not a huge fan of herbal tea, but the taste of this tea is OK, and it is a great value and easy to brew.  What I really love about it, however, is that after drinking it for a couple of weeks, it has noticeably reduced my blood pressure.  I try to drink two cups a day, and am hoping it will bring my numbers down even more with a little bit of time.  Very happy to have found this natural remedy!

I love this tea. I drink it every morning. It is suppose to have benefits such as lowering blood pressure,but not sure about that. I put a little Agave necter in it. I enjoy it more than coffee and I don't get the heart burn or upset stomach from it.

I just received this tea and I'm trying to drink a couple of cups per day to see if it has any effect on my BP. So far so good.  To enhance the flavor of this rather sour tea, I've added some Teavana Orange Blossom Herbal Tea, or Peach Bloom Rooibos Tea.  These combinations make the hibuscus tea quite enjoyable to drink.  I'm sure there are many other teas that would complement the Davidson hibiscus.
I just love this tea, pleasant taste, good value. So much better than what we can buy at the local store.

This Hibiscus tea is absolutly delicious! I have been looking at a buch of stores such as: World Market, Publix, Health food stores, etc, and the prices for this tea is astronomical. When i went onto Amazon i saw a whole pound for 11.88 and i was soo happy!

This is really a wonder tea. Every tea lover should try this whole bud tea in their life time  and see the results. I saw lot of imrovmenet in the glow of skin. No caffine make sme to drink at least 3 times a tea. I can feel the imrovmenet in my energy levels.
This hibiscus tea comes in bulk in a reclosable packet. It is full flavored and can be enjoyed hot or cold.

column9: Quality Product at a reasonable price
column10:
When there is something really good, I always buy and send the item to friends so that more can share good things together.

I found Davidson's Hibiscus flower ordered from Amazon.com is pure, clean, fresh and at a very reasonable price. It did reduce my blood pressure quickly.

I just wanted to say I was very pleasantly surprised to receive this tea in such a huge bag!  The tea is so yummy.  I just pour boiling water over a few petals from the kettle and let steep 5 mins.  Sometimes I add a spoon of sugar but most of the time just drink it without.  When the tea is ready to drink, all the petals sink to the bottom and I don't bother removing them till after I've drank the tea.  I am hooked!  Love it!

I have ordered this yesterday and it arrived today. It was delivered in a nice bag sealed so you can continue using it as a container. the flowers smell fresh and look perfect they are not crushed rather in good shape. They taste perfect .. looking forward for future orders
Saw the reviews, and I am a tea lover; had gotten several other teas, and this one intrigued me; finally ordered it and am I every happy that I did! Try it, guarentee you will like it!

The tea smell fresh while open the package, small portion is pretty enough. I soaked the petals into hot water without boiling and hoping to keep the ingredients alive, it turns out to be tasting so great that I need to add water for dilution, proving the product is originally ( well preserved) plus organic, can't complain. Highly recommend it.

I think this is a very good deal for the price. You receive a really large bag of leaves, and they seem to be very good quality. I bought this product for its benefits in lowering high blood pressure, and my last test was normal. Not sure if it was the tea or a combination of natural remedies, but it can't have hurt. The tea itself is a little bitter if you're just drinking it by itself, so I use a sweetener and it ends up tasting quite good.

I bought this to make my own version of Starbucks' passion tea at home. It's really yummy!

You get A LOT of hibiscus flowers. The tea itself it tangy and fragrant. I make according to the directions but double or triple the flowers to make a concentrate to pour over ice. I add the Starbucks melon syrup to it. If you can't find the Starbucks syrup, the tea still tastes great with honey, agave or enjoyed plain. I also quickly rinse my hibiscus before brewing.

I've never purchased hibiscus before so I can't tell if this is good quality or not, but I'm really happy with my purchase.

I have never tried Hibiscus tea before. The flavor is very nice. I like to mix with lemonade for an Arnold Palmer cold but also very good as a hot tea. You can combime with other tea for a nice flavored green or black tea. This bag makes alot of tea!
I love this tea, I drink it daily, it's a little tart but I love it. Being from the carribean I grew up with the hibiscus tree. So it brings back a lot of memories.
This is delicious tea; I've tried other brands of Hibiscus tea and to me this is the richest and most flavorful.  The others are weak by comparison. I've just ordered my third bag.

I never drank Hibiscus tea before. i drink it daily now. i am very happy with this product and expect to order more. its a big bag and it lasts some time. i regard the value to be very good. I hope this helps
Properly brewed this yields a dark red delicious tea which can lower systolic blood pressure by 20-30 points without other medication.

column9: Great Taste and Deep Red Color
column10: Just a couple petals per cup makes a deep red brew.  I've never used "full-bodied" to describe a cup of tea before, but I think that's how I'd describe the tea that results from these hibiscus flowers.  The flavor really pops out at you and tastes almost as if it's been sweetened.  It's a very pleasant drink.  Consider the known health benefits of hibiscus tea, the fact that this is organic (which greatly improves the nutritional value), and the unbelievably low price of like $12 for a pound (a pound of this will probably last me 4 months), and you have yourself a winner.  Celestial Seasonings primarily uses hibiscus in their teas, but they charge like $3 per box of 20 tea bags, so this clearly comes out on top in my book.

Wonderful product to use daily! I just put a small handful in some hot water and have a great cup of tea.  A favorite way to use it is to let it cool slightly and pour it over ice to enjoy a cup of iced hibiscus tea. I'm taking the holistic approach to control blood pressure and I do feel drinking this daily helps.
After brewing the tea, I chilled it and served it as an iced-tea. Good for a hot summer afternoon.

Tastes good. Smells good. Great color. No coffeine. Natural - no additives at all.
The best tea ever. The only tea I ever need.
At least, that's how I feel after I've been using the tea for a few weeks.
Love it! What else can I say?
Also, I like the packaging. It is pure and simple - no colors, no fancy designs, no long description(s) of how good the tea is. It simply is.
I like that the tea is in bulk. I can put as much (or as little) of it as I want into my cup.
Thanks to Davidson for having such a good product on the market!
Great tasting tea, just wish it were in tea bags - would be much more convenient to use.

column9: organic hibiscus tea from Davidson's teas
column10: The Organic Hibiscus tea from Davidson's Teas is excellent.  Have really enjoyed hot or cold.

I love this tea, its everything everybody is saying about it. But from the first time I brewed this tea, my husband took one look and said to me that its not hibiscus but sorrel tea. I argued, whatever but I decided to look it up anyways  because the tea did look and taste like sorrel drink that we make in the Caribbean.  In the US its called red hibiscus or roselle or Florida cranberry. It does lower blood pressure and it is healthy. My point is that folks think they are drinking actual flower tea and it is misleading when  advertisers have these pretty hibiscus flowers on the cans etc (not this particular brand). This plant is comercially grown in the tropics and also in the US in Louisiana and Florida.

I bought this tea in hopes it would lower my blood pressure.  I have not been to the doctor yet to see if it's helped.  I drink it without any sweetners.  Beautiful red color.  Packaging is good with a zip lock to keep it fresh.  I did find this same tea at my local Mexican market where it's sold as Jamaica at a lower price.  Will probably keep buying it there.

I am trying this tea to see if it speeds up my hair growth as most people have said it would.  It tastes great! I take some cheesecloth, put about 2 tablespoons in, tie it with string and let it seep in my tea for about 10 minutes for maximum potency. I will let you know how its working by the end of the month
The tea is bitter because I made it too strong. It would be much better for me if the bag had instructions on the amount to be used.

I am also trying out hibiscus tea because I have read that there are clinical trials that show hibiscus lowers blood pressure. I'm not sure how strong hibiscus tea is "supposed" to be, but about 10 petals in a coffee mug works for me. The tea produced is very strong and exceptionally sour which, personally, I love. I would say it's similar in taste to rhubarb which I also love. You can add a sugar or sugar alternative if you want, but I say it tastes great straight.

I was expecting this to be a finely chopped powder, but as others have said, these are full petals (see my user added image). You don't really need to buy a tea strainer for this. I use a bombilla sometimes,Stainless Steel Spring Bombilla 1 Count, but really, it isn't necessary. Which is convenient for those of us who get lazy. Put petals in coffee mug, pour in water, microwave for 1:30, voila! Just throw away or eat petals when finished. (They have a nice texture to them after they've steeped for a few minutes).

Other notes: the tea produced is a very deep and pretty magenta. If it spills on something white, like for example my shirt, it turns into an indigo stain. Would probably be good for and all-natural tie-dye.

From Wikipedia:
"A study published in the Journal of Human Hypertension has shown that drinking hibiscus tea can reduce high blood pressure in people with type 2 diabetes. The study results showed the average systolic blood pressure for those drinking hibiscus tea decreased from 134.8 mmHg (17.97 kPa) at the beginning of the study to 112.7 mmHg (15.03 kPa) at the end of the study, one month later.[5] This is consistent with its supposed role as a diuretic."

A friend of mine had tried hibiscus tea and said it was a great "fruity" tea. I bought the Davidson's and was pleased with the product. It is a loose tea and can be steeped for 3-5 minutes. I used roughly a teaspoon per 8oz serving. I sweeten it with agave syrup or honey. It's great served over ice too!

I ordered the hibiscus tea based on information that drinking two cups per day would help reduce blood pressure. I have not been to the doctor yet to see if this working. The product arrived promptly. I drink two cups per day sweetened with a little stevia. My only critical comment would be that
the packaging doesn't give instructions for preparing the tea, such as how
long it should steep. I have been steeping it for five minutes. If that is too long or too short of a time I hope someone will let me know!
